explains: n. 牛栏；大房间；（棒球）候补队员区

sentences.en: The team's bullpen is solid this year.
sentences.cn: 今年该队的候补投手实力不错。

sentences.en: He didn't trust many people, most of all his bullpen.
sentences.cn: 他不相信有很多人，最重要的是他的休息室。

sentences.en: This can be tricky even in a simple bullpen setting, and far more difficult as the team is staffed globally.
sentences.cn: 这在一个小的团队可能是容易的，但对于个全球化分布的团队，就会比较难。
